CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7210 SAS-S/Sx",'sample text', IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "XS-250X-A3FE48118AC", 'PSI"+ BR() +"The PSI model is based on Lithium Ion batteries, therefore a very compact desktop UPS"+ BR() +"Delta"+ BR() +"The Delta UPS is recommended for 8h of emergency calls backup"+ BR() +"Cyberpower"+ BR() +"The Cyberpower UPS is bulky and requires wall mounting the UPS and a battery extension enclosure' ,IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7750SR1",'Please select if you would like an additional AC PSU for redundancy.' ,IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "AirScaleWiFi",'Do not use installed base for captive portal extensions.' ,IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Compact Mobility Unit 20.0 Operating Software on a 32 GB installation / system recovery USB.' ,IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7705SAR18",'Select if you require redundant Control Switch Modules. (If not selected, only one CSM will be added to the shopping cart.)',"Cyberpower"+ BR() +"The Cyberpower UPS is bulky and requires wall mounting the UPS and a battery extension enclosure" + BR() +"PSI"+ BR() +"The PSI model is based on Lithium Ion batteries, therefore a very compact desktop UPS"))))))
CustomField.label: UPS guidance
